name: madlib-website
description: Madlib official website - powered by madlib

scripts.vercel-build: npm i @madlib-lang/madlib && madlib install && npm run build:prod
scripts.build:prod: madlib compile -i src/Main.mad --target browser --bundle --optimize -o build/bundle.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o build/bundle.js build/bundle.js && sass src/styles/main.scss build/styles/main.css && cp src/index.html build/ && cp src/content.json build/ && cp -R src/assets build/
scripts.dev: concurrently "browser-sync start --server build --files build/**" "sass --watch src/styles/main.scss build/styles/main.css" "copy-and-watch --watch src/**/*.{html,svg,json} build/" "copy-and-watch --watch src/assets/* build/assets/" "watch 'npm run build:dev' src"
